column1: pushes at a wide delivery outside off and gets an inside edge backward of square leg

loops one up around leg and it comes on with the arm to drift down the leg side. Mire tries to clip but gets beaten because of how sharp the drift is. Loses shape and loosely takes the backfoot out of the crease and the keeper whips the bails off
non-turning fullish delivery outside off, puts the bat forward and gets beaten on the outside edge
catching practice to midwicket. Two in the opening over for Bangladesh. Loops up a half-volley that angles in around middle and off and Ervine chips the clip straight into the hands of midwicket
full and sliding on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket
sliding down the leg side again and he keeps the bat inside the line after turning around for a flick
comes forward and defends and gets an inside edge into the on side
slight spin away from the right-hander, defended off the outside of the bat into the off side
full around off, defended into the off side
flighted up on middle, driven out
stays back to a length ball that straightens aroud middle and defends back
loopy, curves in around middle, driven out to wide long-off
goes for an extravagant drive to a delivery that drifts into him and inside-edges it to the back pad
tossed up around off, driven to wide long-off
drifts it down the leg side as it curves into him
good length, stays back and defends off the inside of the bat down the pitch
full around off, driven through the extra cover region
pitched up on off, driven down to long-off
full, slid into middle, driven to wide long-off for one
length ball, straightens around the middle-stump channel and finds the outside of the bat to backward point
stays back to a length ball, it's an arm ball and rushes him and he finds the inside edge
too short from the bowler. Rocks back and heaves a pull through the cow corner region
back of a length around off, stands tall and punches past the left of the bowler
fuller around off, driven off the inside of the bat down the pitch as it comes on with the arm
good length, spinning away outside off, defended
reaches out to a fuller ball and drills it back off the inside of the bat
fullish, sliding on middle and leg, pushed back
defended off the front foot back to the bowler
tossed up and accurate on the stumps, defended
full, curves in on the stumps, driven to long-off
full, curving in on middle, pushed down to long-on
fullish, more than a set of stumps outside off, leaves it as it holds its line
slightly back of a length on off, stands tall and jabs it towards mid-off
short and wide, slaps it hard through the point region. A nothing half-tracker
short of good length on the stumps, gets on top of the bounce and keeps it out
pushes forward to meet the pitch and the ball comes on with the arm to find the inside of the bat to fine leg
length ball, pitching on middle and straightening, stays back to a delivery he should have been foreard to ad gets an outside edge that bounces in front of first slip
full outside off, driven down to long-off
flat and full on off, defended
floats it up temptingly outside off and induces a wide drive through the covers
well away from the right-hander, left alone
full outside off, punched to long-on
short of a length on middle, flicked into the midwicket region
short of good length, angling into middle, pats it down to deep backward square leg for one
short of a length outside off, punched firmly to cover

edged and taken. That's a rather poor shot. Chases a delivery he had no business playing. No effort to get behind the line or move closer to the pitch. Simply stands in the crease and swings big to get a discernible edge to the keeper
full and flat on middle and leg, pushed down the pitch
oh, shot. Leans into a drive and pushes it firmly along the ground to the right of extra cover. Top shot
shuffles across and lets this length ball go outside off
fullish length, no turn, left alone
pitched up outside off, presses forward and defends
comes forward to defend and the ball comes on with the arm to take the inside of the bat
short of a length on off, defended
fired well away from the batsman and drifts away further as he walks across and lets it be
shuffles across to this length ball and lets it go
fullish on off, defended with an open face to point
short of a length, stops on him a little and he chips it in the air as he closes the face a little early. Lands in front of midwicker running in
left alone outside off
fullish length, drifts away further from the fifth-stump channel, left alone
dipping yorker on off, squeezed out to point
reaches out for a cover drive and caresses it with a neat swing of the bat. Beats the fielder diving to his right
good length, angled across around the fourth or fifth-stump channel, defended
length ball on middle, defended back
short of a length outside off, defended
good length on middle and leg, bunts it out from the crease
fullish, tails away from well outside off, left alone
back of a length, keeps a little low outside off, stays in the crease and knocks it through the covers
good ball. Fires it temptingly outside off. Keeps low and tails back in late. Raza shuffles across and shoulders arms
back of a length outside off, gets behind the line solidly and defends this time
great seam position. Accurate length ball outside off, bunted back
good length, not much pace, gets forward and taps it to midwicket for one
slants across a length ball and has him all squared up as the ball beats the outside edge
good length around off, getsa good stride across and defends soldily
short of a length, climbs on him and leaves him with little time to react, manages to get something as he tries to shift back and keep it out
back of a length outside off, opens the face and steers to backward point
short of a length. Again no pace and he is a little confused as the ball climbs and has him all squared up
good length, holds its line outside off, left alone
fullish length outside off, comes forward and tucks it away into the midwicket region
short of a length, angles in on leg, taps it to the left of the deep backward square leg fielder
fullish length, shapes away outside off, left alone
short of a length, nips away again but it's too wide to start off to make the batsman play
full, nips away from outside off, too wide again and Taylor shoulders arms
fullish, cross-seam cutter on middle and off, moves away as he defends off the outside of the bat to point
back of a length around middle, quietly keeps it out on the leg side
good length, pitches on middle and angles away around off, defended
chases a wide delivery. This was coming with the dots building up. The ball jags away substantially to leave him beaten. Off-cutter again
that was a virtual off-break. Short of a length, just moves away considerably to leave the batsman squared up. That turned away like a conventional left-arm spin

oh my god! That's an unbelievable six. How has that gone for six? Seems like it would be a simple catch for a fielder inside the circle looking at the way he chipped it. Another slower ball, heaves it over but gets no timing wahatsoever. It was pretty full and inside his swinging arc. Bang off the middle of the bat. That perhaps helped him
good length outside off, drops it into the off side and takes off for a quick single even as cover runs forward and fires a throw at the keeper's end
length ball, angling in towards off, shuffles across and blocks solidly
short of a length around off, punched into the covers
short of good length outside off, gets on top of the bounce and tucks it into midwicket for one
gets it to jag away considerably and finds the outside part of his bat. Safely past the backward point fielder diving to his left
full and angled across on off, jams the bat down. Another off-cutter that turns away from him to leave him beaten

he's been probing away in that channel and gets an outside edge finally. This one's the quicker conventional delivery and Taylor sticks the bat out to get a good, clear edge to the keeper. Zimbabwe sinking now
just short of good length, shapes away from the right-hander and bounces considerably as well to whizz past the bat
steered to point
length ball that straightens around off, shifts back and punches down to long-off
jams the bat down to a fuller delivery and bunts into the off side
turn and bounce! Pitches on a length just around off and draws him forward before getting it to rip past the outside edge
fuller delivery, crashes it out into the covers
walks forward and clumsily drives into the off side, towards the point region
overpitched full outside off stump, gets his bat down and pings the ball to deep point
good length on off stump, sliding across the batsman's body as he punches to cover off the back foot
short on middle, Raza drops his hands from near his face and taps the ball down. Forced to tiptoe
full ball, but slower on this occasion, pitches just outside off, and stays low. Goes through to the keeper on the bounce. Left alone
good length on middle stump, steps forward and defends off the front foot
back of a length outside leg stump, angles into Raza's hips eventually, tapped off his back foot to the leg side
good length just outside off, pokes at it, takes the outside edge and falls just short of flrst slip
back of a length on off stump, steps back and punches it to the bowler
back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up on off stump, prods forward and lifts this over cover, played inside out, but wide long off intercepts
good length on off stump, defends off the front foot. Takes the outside edge and trickles down to point
full on off stump, big stride forward and defended
back of a length outside off, steps back and attempts a square cut, but plays under the delivery. Goes through to the keeper
good length outside off, firmly driven down the ground, but straight to mid off
full and wide outside off, driven square off the front foot to the man in the deep. Only a single
back of a length on off stump, angling into the batsman, clipped off his hips to deep backward square

dropped at first slip! Good length wide outside off, tries to cut at it with hard hands, takes the top edge through to Nasir Hossain at wide first slip, drops a simple catch. Smiles all around, though, given Bangladesh's dominance all morning. Rubel gives out a smile too. Was a regulation chance
goes short to end the over, pitched outside off and soars over the batsman's head. No shot offered
full outside off, driven off the front foot to short cover, diving effort from the fielder stops the single
tossed up from as wide as possible, drifts and lands on middle, tapped back to the bowler off the front foot. Tight
full on middle and leg, Raza's cramped for room, fended back to Sunzamul
full on middle stump, tapped to short cover
uses his feet this time, full outside off, and driven between cover and mid off. Work for the men at wide long off and deep extra cover
tossed up full outside off, opens the bat's face and carves it to cover point
stays low! Back of a length outside off, tries to cut given where the ball pitched, but the ball stays very slow. Through to the keeper
good length on off stump, jags back into the batsman's pads, worked off his pads to square leg off the back foot
back of a length outside off, movement in the air, walks across to the off side and punched firmly to mid off off the front foot
good length outside off, angles into him as he tries to cut, too close to his body to play the shot, and it takes the top edge. Safely through to third man this time
almost a yorker on off stump, low full toss eventually. Struck firmly to mid off
good length outside off, movement in the air, cut off the back foot to cover point. Well stopped by the fielder followed up by a sharp throw at the non striker's. Raza was always in, though
yorker on leg stump, cramps Raza on this occasion. Hits the inside of his boot
overpitched on off stump, dug away square to the off side. Man in the deep
straightens from middle after pitching, full ball and defended off the front foot
beaten! Full on off stump, grip and turn away from the batsman's attempted drive. Flies just past his outside edge and barely over the top of off stump
full on middle, driven off the front foot to deep extra cover
low full toss on middle and leg, mistimed towards midwicket, beats the infielder, thereby allowing them to take the run
short outside off, attacking the batsman's body as it angles sharply in, does well to sway away from the line of the delivery while dropping his knees
back of a length outside off, pokes at it towards cover, takes off for a quick run. Completed with ease
full on middle stump, tapped off the front foot to midwicket, nice and early call for the run. Better rotation of the strike, now, between these two
loses his balance while swaying away! Short on middle, and once again coming to the batsman near his chest, does very well to get out of the line of the ball, but falls over while trying to get away
too short outside off, flies off the surface this time, and it's too high for the keeper as well. Free runs
full outside off, and it's crunched! Driven beautifully past cover, and there's no stopping that. Hammered!
full and straight on off stump, hit back to mid off off the front foot
full on middle stump, turned off his toes to midwicket with soft hands, forces the keeper to chase behind it and they scamper through for the single
full on off stump, hit hard back to Sunzamul. Puts his hands out, but dropped! Just couldn't hold on to it
full outside off, carved inside out to cover
makes amends! Floats another one on off stump, too close to cut once again, and it's edged through to Sabbir at first slip. Sharp, sharp catch. Taken low to his right
full outside off, big stride forward and defended
full on off stump once again, defended off the front foot with soft hands. Carefully played, with eyes on the ball at all times
short and wide outside off, slapped over point on this occasion. Well hit, and races away to the boundary. Latches onto the width
good length outside off, angling in, shoulders his arms after covering his off stump, stays low as it goes through to the keeper
back of a length outside off, extra bounce through to Raza, worked off his hips to midwicket off the back foot. They walk through for the run
full outside off, goes straight through to Mushfiq with the batsman offering no shot. Came forward and covered his off-stump line though
back of a length outside off, punched off the front foot with the bat's open face. Can't  go past cover point
good length outside off, tapped off the front foot to cover
tossed up full on off stump, almost a yorker. Dug away back past the non-striker
good length on off stump, backs away and muscles this past Sunzamul's right. Through to long off
tossed up outside off stump, driven to short extra cover
full on off stump, pushed through to long off after stepping forward
quicker ball this time, good length on middle and leg, cramps the batsman as he nudges this to square leg
full on middle and leg, down on one knee as Raza tries to sweep. Goes down the leg side, however
full outside off, tries to drive with the turn, comes off the inside of the bat instead. Trickles back to the bowler
tossed up on middle stump, prods forward and defends with soft hands
full outside off, tapped off the front foot to wide long off. They walk across for the single
full outside off, driven down the ground but mistimed. Stopped by Shakib on his folow through
back of a length outside off, stays low as Raza backs away and muscles this in front of square. Can't beat the man at cover
how did that miss leg stump? Full on off stump, and stays very low! Tries to defend but the ball takes the inside edge and slips through between his bat and pad. Goes just past leg stump. Well bowled
back of a length on middle and this time Shakib's been sent away! Goes deep into the crease and pulls with a lot of power over cow corner
full outside off, floated in but well negated off the front foot. Defended
full outside off once again, defended back to Sunzamul
full, but slightly wider outside off, driven with the bat's open face to point
short outside off, cut away despite the ball angling into him. Goes past point, forcing the man in the deep to cut it off
full on middle stump, nudged off the front foot towards midwicket. No one there, forcing the bowler to chase behind it
full on middle and leg, tapped with soft hands towards the leg side
good length on middle stump, steps back and punches off the back foot. Straight to mid on
overpitched outside off, driven well off the front foot to deep extra cover
back of a length outside off, backs away and tries to cut. But not hit well enough, and doesn't have the direction either. Straight to short cover
full outside off, forces Raza to step forward and tackle the delivery. Defended off the front foot
full outside off, big stride forward and fended with soft hands
back of a length outside off, steps towards the leg side and makes a little extra room. Cut uppishly past point to the man in the deep
good length outside off, tapped down the ground to long off
full ball on off stump, no real spin. Defended with soft hands
full on off stump, drives straight but takes the inside edge. Flies away towards square leg
full outside off again, defended with the bat's open face to cover point
tossed up on middle, and he attempts a slog sweep! Big wind up from the batsman, but a blind slog, really. Flies over first slip's head. Lucky
full outside off, tapped down the ground back to the bowler. Sunzamul finishes his ten overs (1 for 29)
back of a length outside off, angles further away from the batsman. Raza shoulders his arms
full on leg stump, gentle offcutter, defended with soft hands back towards the non-striker
good length on middle and leg, chops it down to short third man off the back foot. Can't find the gap
full outside leg but angling into his pads, tapped off his legs behind square past the umpire, forces deep midwicket to race in. Allows them to take the second run
back of a length on middle stump, gets on top of the ball and flicks this square off the back foot. Dribbles away to midwicket

back of a length outside off, angles away further. Tries to poke at it away from his body. Takes the bottom edge and goes through to the keeper. Could've very easily been played on too. Tight stuff from Mustafizur
full on middle stump, turned off the front foot to midwicket
good length outside off, sharp turn into his pads. May have taken a crack on the surface that time. Hurries onto the batsman, forcing him to turn this towards square leg off the back foot
good length on middle stump, turns into the batsman as he tries to flick this behind square. Hits his pads, and big appeal from the bowler, but he seems to be the only one interested
huge appeal for lbw! But turned down. Full outside off, and tries to sweep this. Misses the shot, but hits his pads outside off
full on off stump, worked off his pads to midwicket
good length outside off, punched off the back foot to mid on. Muscled away, really, with no proper timing
full on off stump, pushed away from his body past the vacant cover-point region. Two men in the deep, on the off slde, however
good length on middle stump, played with soft hands towards point, and they race off for a quick singe
offcutter on middle stump on a good length, turned with the bat's closed face to midwicket. Firmly hit away
back of a length on middle stump, angling away from the right-hander, but he flicks away with his wrists to square leg. Delicately played
back of a length on middle stump, turned off the back foot to the vacant region at midwicket. The partnership moves on to 34 off 55
full outside off, stays low through to the keeper. Shoulders his arms and lets it go through
full on middle stump, tapped off the front foot to midwicket
full outside off, big stride forward and defended away to cover
back of a length outside off, steps back and cuts this square. HIt very well, but stopped nicely by cover. Got his body behind the ball
back of a length outside off, cut late off the back foot, but only to short third man. Fourth dot in a row
full on middle and off, fended back to Nasir
avoids the maiden over, Zimbabwe. Full on middle stump, and driven down past the non-striker to long on
good length on middle stump, angling down the leg side as he flicks this fine off his pads. Through to fine leg
good length on middle stump, stays on the back foot and works this away to midwicket
full on middle stump, goes down the leg side but not before brushing the batsman's pads. The keeper can't stop it either as he dives to his left. Leg byes to the total
back of a length outside off, extra bounce this time and punched past cover point off the back foot
full outside off, opens the bat's face and works this away to cover point. No single this time though
back of a length outside off, tapped off the back foot to cover. No run, and with that it's drinks.
full on middle stump, offspin down the leg side but tapped away to square leg with the turn
good length on middle stump, worked off his toes to midwicket. No run
good length on middle stump, tentative step forward and attempts to work this behind square, bat-pad shot
full outside off, charges down the wicket and it's driven beautifully past cover. Races away to the extra-cover boundary. Theres the fifty
full outside off, steps forward and taps to cover off the front foot
tossed up on middle stump, almost a yorker. Dug away to long on. Raza will keep strike
full on off stump, comes down the ground and drives firmly back past the bowler. Straight to mid off, though
back of a length outside off, backs away and cuts from near his body. Only to point
full outside off, tapped away off the front foot to mid off
slower ball on middle stump, hit down the ground to long on as they walk through for the single
full outside off, fended off the front foot
full and slow outside off, nice change up to end the over. Defended with soft hands to mid off

mix up! Is Raza run out? Full on middle, turned off his toes to square leg. Raza wants the quick run, but it's not there. He's halfway down before Moor asks him to turn back. Falls short by a few inches. Never a single, there.
back of a length outside off, spins into him, punched off the back foot to mid on
full outside off and sharply turns away, punched off the back foot once again. Straight to mid on
good length outside off, turns into him, worked towards midwicket
full on off stump, blocked back to Nasir off the front foot
good length on off stump, muscled away off the back foot past square leg to the man in the deep
good length on off stump, walks across to the off side and turns this fine down the leg side
full outside off, tapped with the bat's open face to cover
full outside off, mistimed down the ground to mid on. The bat turned in his hand
back of a length outside off, punched back past the non-striker to mid on. They want the quick run, forcing Mahmudullah to dive and throw in
full, offcutter on middle stump, deceived completely. Tries to turn this towards square leg, but can't make contact
another offcutter outside off, but this time it's been lifted over cover. Hit well enough to beat wide long off
good length on off stump, goes deep into the creaes and punches through to long on
good length on middle stump, tapped down the ground once again. The man at long on comes into action once again
full on off stump, hit back to Shakib
full on middle, and it's swept away. Hit well past the square-leg umpire to deep backward point
flatter on off stump, goes onto the back foot, and punched to mid on
tossed up on middle stump, and the punch off the back foot takes a leading edge. Falls just short of the diving short extra cover fielder.
back of a length outside off, turns into the batsman, muscled off the back foot to wide long on.
full outside off, driven back past the non-striker to long on. The ball seems to be following that position
full on off stump, Cremer walks across to the off side and tries to flick this to the leg side. Hits his pad, but the around-the-wicket angle doesn't help the lbw cause
good length on middle, worked behind square off the back foot to fine leg
big appeal! But turned down again. Attempts a sweep to this full ball but misses
tries the reverse sweep! This one doesn't come off either, takes his pad as he attempts the shot. Lobs up, but falls in front of his pads, just about far enough from the keeper
overpitched on middle stump, bunted down the ground to wide long on. Muscled away past the non-striker
flighted full outside off, driven to cover
tossed up outside off, big wind up to slog this over cow corner. Stays low, and misses completely as the ball straightens after pitching. Barely misses off stump
full on off stump, zips through this time. Blocked back to Shakib
dispatched away! Short outside off, enough room for Moor to free his arms. Goes back and pulls along the ground to the cow-corner boundary
full outside off, another attempted cross-batted slog, but doesn't come off this time. Played to wide long on

full on off stump, stroked away wide of cover, hit well to deep extra cover. They want the second, and Cremer is halfway down when Moor sends him back. Moor's looking at the ball instead of Cremer. But the throw is at the wrong end. Survives
full on off stump, hit down the ground to long off once again
good length pitching outside leg, extra bounce off the pitch as he nudges this with the shoulder of his bat to square leg. Hit softly enough
good length on leg stump, fended back to Fizz off the back foot
good length on leg stump, carved off the back foot to cover. Loud and early call for the single
good length on leg stump, got on top of the bounce and blocks this awkwardly away towards cover. They scamper through for the single
good length on middle stump, straightened after pitching. Hit back to the bowler off the back foot
back of a length outside off, muscled back to Shakib off the back foot. Not letting the batsman get away

full and wide outside off, hit very well but straight down long off's throat! Sharply taken by the fielder in the deep, racing in and diving forward. Struck hard, but off the toe end. Low catch to Rubel. Appreciation from the bowler
full on off stump, tapped back to Shakib once more
full on off stump, turned off his toes to midwicket
full on off stump, big slog attempted and it's off the bat's toe end. It's a skyer, but falls just away from the man at mid on. Tough chance for the fielder who was running backwards
full on off stump, driven off the front foot to short extra cover
full outside leg, goes down the leg side. Attempts to flick behind square, but misses the shot
a peach! Good length on middle stump, angles away from his body as he tries to poke at it with the bat's open face. The batsman's lucky it didn't brush his blade on the way through
full on middle stump, tapped towards mid off with soft hands. Early call for the run. Moor wants the second, but not possible this time
good length on middle and leg, angling once again across Jarvis' body as the ball comes off the back of his hand. Inches away from the batsman's bat as it goes through to Mushfiq. Foxed
Fizz is dominating here. Good length on leg stump, goes across his body once more as Jarvis fishes at it outside edge

finds the outside edge this time, but short of the keeper! Full on off stump, and Jarvis goes chasing at it. Defended with soft hands, and takes the edge, but just in front of Mushfiqur. They ask the umpire for the catch, but it had fallen in front
yorker on middle and leg, dug away over the bowler's head through to mid off. Only a single
slow, low, full toss on leg stump. Clipped off his pads to square leg. Can't put this loose ball away
yorker on middle stump! Backs away too much, as the delivery crashes into the base of the stumps. Moved away too much, and the ball was accurate!
on a hat trick! Inside edge ricochets onto middle stump! Overpitched full and wide outside off, tries to drive at it, but no movement of the feet
That will have to wait. Short and wide outside off, left alone. Not the best ball to bowl to a No. 11. Should've gone full and straight
full outside off, muscled back to Rubel off the front foot. Nicely taken by the bowler on his followthrough
full, slower ball on middle stump, angling away from Jarvis as he tries to slog towards the leg side
full on leg stump, tries to slog towards the leg side but takes the leading edge over point's head
full on off stump, but going across the batsman's body. Tries a wild slog but misses
back of a length on leg stump, tries to play towards the leg side but takes another leading edge to short extra cover
full on middle and leg, tries a heave over midwicket, but misses. Hits his pad, but was going to go down leg side, anyway. They scamper through for a single

good length on off stump, and straightens after pitching. The batsman plays down the wrong line as the ball sneaks past the outside of his bat. The cutter earns Fizz another wicket. Zimbabwe are all out for 170.
good length, shapes to angle away but nibbles in a touch, defended gingerly to the midwicket region
floated full and slanting away outside off with the angle, no shot
even fuller and wider outside off, off-side wide, as Tamim ushers it through to Taylor
full and straight, Tamim presses forward and pokes an outside edge to backward point. Hint of away movement for Jarvis
explodes from a length outside off, gets really big on Tamim, who stabs a single past the slip cordon to third man
Anamul marks his return to the ODI fold with a crisp drive straight of mid-on. He stretches out, meets the pitch, and executes the perfect on drive
glanced off the pads to fine leg
ooooh, that's super stylish from Anamul. Sprayed full on the pads, he presses forward, picks it up and whips it with the wrists over square leg
short, wide, fetch that! Anamul sizes it up and cracks it away to the cover boundary. To add to Zimbabwe's woes, that's a front-foot no-ball
full and angling in towards middle and leg, Anamul is early into his leg-side swipe, drags an inside edge to deep square leg
jumps from a length and pings the glove. Tamim loosens his grip and fends it off to the off side
darted full on the pads, picked off easily behind square on the leg side. Cremer slips in the deep
full and angling away outside off, too full to be honest, Tamim stretches out and caresses a square-drive. The ball rolls away to the boundary
good length and slanting away outside off, Tamim quietly tucks his bat inside the line
good length, moves away outside off, skirts past the outside edge. Jarvis found extra bounce too
pitched up and outside off, forward and drilled back to Jarvis, the ball bursts out of his hands
fullish and on off, Anamul manipulates a single to mid-on with the wrists
sliding into off stump, jabbed into the covers
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to the right of Mire at mid-off
good length on a fourth-stump line, Anamul deploys a solid stride and defends it to the off side
skids on full outside off, the new ball usually skids on, tapped down to long-off
non-turning offbreak on off stump, Anamul attacks it with a ferocious slog-sweep. He stretches out and hits it with the intended break over square leg
offbreak, turns in on off, tapped to the leg side with soft hands this time
fast slider, jabbed to midwicket
slides in at 88.3ks and hits the pad, but this was heading down the leg side with the sharp angle

There is only one fielder in the deep on the leg side - and Anamul Haque hits it straight into the lap of that man. This was tossed up slower and higher outside off, he brings out the slog sweep again, makes good connection again, but finds the fielder this time. One shot too many? Anamul's mad dash is over
back of a length and angling away outside off, punched into the covers
full and just a shade outside off, Tamim scoops a drive back to the bowler
attempted slower ball? Finishes on the hips, tucked away behind square for one
tip and run to mid-on for a single. That's the experience of Tamim. That's what Anamul should have done
back of a length and angling away outside off, Shakib can't resist a jab away from the body and nearly plays on
Shakib stretches out to meet this full ball on off. Push-driven to mid-off
Tamim stays leg-side of this full ball on off and bunts a single to mid-off
back of a length offbreak outside off, Shakib goes deep in the crease and firmly punches to long-off
forced off the pads to midwicket as Raza keeps hitting those hard in-between lengths
flatter and skids on outside off, not quite short enough for a cut, Shakib slashes and misses
tossed up full on middle, pushed back to the right of the bowler
dropped short and wide outside off, Shakib picks the length and clunks it to cover-point, where the fielder dives to his right and fumbles
good length and on middle stump, gently defended back to the bowler
attempted short ball, keeps low on middle, this shin-high ball is swatted out to deep square. Great adjustment from Tamim
floated full and outside off, forward and driven on the up to the covers
back of a length and angling away outside off, Tamim allows the ball to come to him, then whips it with the wrists to the right of deep midwicket
short and angling away outside off, keeps low again, Shakib can't slap it past the off-side infield
whipped away to deep midwicket again
sliding down the leg side, past the sweep, past the keeper, rolls away for four wides
Tamim thrusts his bat in front of the pad and blocks this straight ball to the off side
this leg-stump ball is knocked through midwicket
full and darted on middle, tapped to mid-on
full on middle again, defended back to Raza
another leg-side wide, beats the sweep but not the keeper
nice dip and turn, takes the outside edge on the drive and rolls to short third man
speared on off, too full to get under the length, stabbed back to Raza
good length and angling away outside off, watchfully run away to backward point
full and angling away outside off, stabs a drive down the ground, bisecting mid-on and mid-off
short, wide, Shakib has a crack at it and skies it to third man
back of a length, tip and run to the off side, beside the pitch
shorter and angling away outside off, Shakib rides the bounce and guides the ball to backward point
eases it off the pads to long leg to close out the over
angling in from around the wicket and then ripping away past the outside edge
sliding into the pads, nurdled to midwicket on the front foot
really full on leg stump, no turn, jabbed out to midwicket
dangled up on middle, forward and smothered with caution
straight ball on middle, Tamim gets on the front foot and plays it back to the bowler
leg-stump full-toss, Tamim can't whack it to the boundary. Instead, he flicks and finds deep midwicket
back of a length and angling away outside off, a crease-bound Shakib drags it against the angle to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Shakib drives gloriously on the up but can't place it past cover
shorter on middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
dug in short and wide outside off, Shakib jumps off the ground and scythes an upper-cut over backward point
the debutant keeps offering up Shakib width outside off, he laps it up and bashes a cover-drive

three boundaries in a row for Shakib. Anamul applauds from the change room. Back of a length and outside off, he stands tall and simply punches through the line and watches the ball skip away through the covers
slightly back of a length and outside off, Tamim employs the latest of late cuts and steers the ball to third man
slower cutter outside off, Shakib wafts early and makes no contact. Zimbabwe need to try more change-ups or attack the body
back of a length and skids in towards off stump, jabbed into the covers
off-stump ball, turned into the vacant spaces at midwicket for a single
floated full and outside off, Tamim stretches forward, opens the face and dabs the ball to backward point
short, wide, he hammers a cut straight to backward point
Muzarabani is struggling with his lines and lengths. This time he errs in line and sprays it wide outside off
back of a length and outside off, punched up to mid-off
on a length and outside off, Shakib presses forward and stokes it to mid-off again
hip-high short ball on middle and leg, Shakib swivels on the back foot and sweetly pulls the ball to deep square leg
tip and run to cover-point. Tamim and Shakib keep Bangladesh ticking
Shakib rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and secures a single to third man
good length and runs through the corridor with extra bounce, left alone
on a length and outside off, tapped to backward point
Shakib spoons a leading edge but it dies in front of backward point tearing in. Raza dives forward but the ball eludes his reach. It fell well short of him
full and wide outside off, carted through the line to sweeper cover
low full-toss outside off, Shakib stretches out and middles a cover-drive, places it between covers and mid-off
nudged from off stump to the left of short midwicket
full and outside off, Tamim stretches out and drives to sweeper cover
back of a length and turns back in on off stump, blocked to midwicket off the back foot
tossed up on off, worked square through the leg side for one
full and sliding away of off, played back to the left of the bowler
short and bounces on middle, late-cut wide of short third man off the back foot
short and turns away - googly - outside off, jabbed to backward point. Tamim gesticulates it went the other way
tickles it off the pads to short fine leg
full and straight, tip and run to midwicket
pushed to midwicket again, this time off the inside half
shorter offbreak, turns away outside off, forced with great authority through the covers
tossed on middle, dabs it off the face to backward point and hares across to the other end
short, wide, belted straight to extra cover
tossed up slower and higher on middle, driven down to long-on
lobbed up on middle and turns in, dragged out to deep square leg off the inside half of the bat
Tamim presses forward to defend this full ball on a fourth-stump line
biting legbreak, Tamim has a short stride, the ball grazes the inside edge and rolls square on the leg side
tossed on middle, eased down to long-on. Jogged single
short, wide, Cremer cops punishment. He nimbly skips back and square-cuts it away to the left of backward point
worked wide of short fine leg for a single
drifting down leg, past the attempted sweep of Shakib
drifts in at off and breaks past the outside edge as Shakib has a loose prod at it
tapped down to wide long-on off the front foot this time
full and sliding away outside off, driven off the front foot to wide long-off. An overthrow hands Bangladesh two more runs
tickled to short fine leg coming in
arm ball, Shakib hangs back and keeps it out on middle stump
fractionally short and wide outside off, cut to backward point
full on off stump, spins into the left-hander, defended away towards the leg side
not afraid to flight it up, full outside off, down on one knee and tries to sweep, but misses as he loses his balance. Struck him outside off
full on off stump, and zipping straight through to the keeper. Close, just past the outside edge of Tamim's attempted defense
good length on leg stump, spinning down the leg side, misses the attempted pull. They appeal for the caught behind, but not given

once again full on leg stump, misses the flick off his pads and the ball goes down the leg side. Sharply taken by the keeper. Soft appeal for caught behind, and it's given! Tamim reviews. Absolutely no touch from the bat there. The decision has been overturned. But the umpire isn't declaring it a wide, now. Ok, now he does. Awkward all around.
full outside off stump, steps forward and tries to sweep, misses the shot, but they don't want the leg bye
good length outside off, spinning away from Tamim as he pokes at it, cut late past short third man, and it beats the infielder. A boundary off the over's extra ball
full on leg stump, can't tap this away to square leg. Hits his pad outside leg stump

19.1 full on off stump, steps forward and attempts a defense, misses the shot. Big appeal from Raza for the lbw, but not out, says the umpire. Raza asks Cremer to review. Pitched full on off stump, drifts into his pads, no contact with the bat. Impact in line, and would've gone on to crash into leg stump. The umpire overturns his decision.
tossed up on off stump, turned off his toes to square leg
flighted full on off stump, cramped for room on this occasion, dug away to cover
width offered full outside off, can't drive this past cover. Mistimed back to Raza
full outside off, big stride forward and defended
overpitched full outside off, prods forward and defends to see the over out
full on middle stump, spins in, defended off the front foot. Tight bowling
back of a length on off stump, goes deep into his crease and taps it back to Cremer
tossed up full on middle stump, tries to work it towards midwicket but takes the leading edge. Not quite timed, as it falls just short of Cremer. Could've been a catch
full on off stump, steps forward and drives to the man at long on
tossed up full outside off stump, zips straight through on this occasion. Left alone by the batsman
full on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
full on off stump, steps forward and defends to short extra cover
Tamim backs away towards the leg side and Raza pushes this full outside off. Does well to dig this away to cover. Tamim was almost foxed, there
full on middle stump, muscled down the ground to mid on, but it's a misfield! Mire the guilty man here. Races away to the long-on boundary
good length on middle stump, makes room and slashes hard at it. Runs away past the short third-man fielder
full on middle and off, driven to cover off the front foot
good length on off stump, tapped with the bat's open face towards cover point. There's the fifty
full on middle stump, steps across to the off side and goes down on one knee exposing two stumps. Tries an extravagant sweep, but mistimed to short fine leg
good length on middle and leg, spins into Tamim's body, effectively cramping him. Tries to flick off his hips, but misses
full on middle stump, comes down the wicket and slogs this towards cow corner, mistimed shot, but enough behind it to fetch him two
good length on middle stump, quick to spot the length, swivels, and lifts this over square leg. Down on one knee, and smacked over the infield behind square
full on off stump, driven firmly away from his body, can't beat the man at cover though

full on leg stump, Tamim walks across to the off side and sweeps once again. Takes a top edge, and over the keeper's head. More runs for the opener, who is not afraid anymore to take his chances. Exposed two stumps once again on that occasion
full ball darted in on middle stump, tapped away towards the leg side off the front foot
gets off the mark with a six! Uses his feet to get under this ball, full on middle and smacked over the bowler's head. Lands near the sightscreen
full outside off stump, attempted sweep from Mushfiq, straight to short fine leg
full on middle stump, worked off his toes to midwicket
good length on middle stump, spinning down the leg side but Mushfiqur taps it away. Would've been a wide if left alone
overpitched full and wide outside off, squeezed away towards the leg side rather unconvincingly. Tried to drive this square

good length outside off, spinning further away, cut off the back foot to deep point. Good effort from the fielder in the deep, parrying it back, but his feet have touched the ropes in his attempt. Boundary
tossed up full on middle stump, prods forward and turned towards the leg side
tossed up on off stump, shuffles across to the off side to get inside the line of the ball, and then smacks it over deep backward square. Quick to settle down on one knee, and sent into orbit
flighted on leg stump, turned off his toes to short fine leg
tossed up on middle stump, driven with soft hands to mid off. Calls early for the quick run
tossed up full on off stump, big stride forward and defended towards short cover
good length on middle stump, glances it fine past short third man. Work for the fielder, as he gives it a chase. Stops it from going for a four, though
full on off stump, slapped away from his body to the man in the deep
full outside off, the ball's angling into the right-hander, and he cuts late. Flies past the right of the keeper, and once again short third-man goes chasing behind it. Comes back for the second
tossed up full on off stump, tries to check his drive as th ball takes an inside edge towards the leg side
darted in full outside leg stump, goes down the leg side for extras. The keeper does well to get his body behind the ball
full on middle stump, mistimed his drive
tossed up on middle stump, lands up as a yorker, dug away to mid on
back of a length on middle stumps, goes deep into the crease and taps it back to Cremer
good length on middle stump, spins into him, turned off his hips to square leg
good length wide outside off, pokes at it and plays towards short third man
full on off stump, defended with soft hands
full and wide outside off, slapped away from his body to cover. Misfield once again by the man there, allowing the ball to go through his legs. Four free runs. Jarvis the guilty man on this occasion
back of a length on middle stump, goes deep into the crease and nudges this to deep midwicket
good length on middle and leg, flicked off his hips to square leg
short and wide outside off, tries to cut but not in the gap. Stopped by Raza at cover. But, oh dear, it's a big no ball.
can't put it away! Back of a length wide outside off, attempts a cut but plays under the delivery. Extra bounce this time
back of a length outside off, angling into the batsman, got big on him but does well to tap this off his chest towards the leg side
full outside off once again, another huuuge no ball from the bowler. Another free hit, this time to Tamim
full and wide outside off, takes the outside edge through to the keeper. Would've been out, but it was a free hit. Plus, it's another no ball. His no balls are getting bigger and bigger.
full and wide outside off, goes over the tram lines through to the keeper. Tamim misses the wild slog, but another big no ball from the debutant. The free hit continues.
full on off stump, slapped away from his body over cover, falls short of the man in the deep. Tamim scampers back for the second run

back of a length on leg stump, tapped off his hips to deep backward square. They want the second, and Tamim may be out here! Direct hit from the man at deep backward square, but replays suggest he's in.
back of a length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket for a quick run, another direct hit at the non-striker's makes the Zimbabweans interested, but replays say 'not out'. End of a marathon over
full on middle stump, worked off his toes to midwicket. Wants a quick run, get it with ease
full on leg stump, swept with the turn on this occasion.  Goes over the square-leg umpire, and deep backward square can't stop this either
good length on middle stump, turned off his hips to short fine leg. There's the win! Bangladesh win by eight wickets.
